column5: At a decent price, or are they really that expensive ? I have seen them from $40 and up. Is there a lower price one out there that Im not seeing ? I like the way it  finishes off the look of a fly. Would be great for making perch and crappie bugs that would last. BPS has a kit, but it,s like $70. Thanks
Sent you an amazon link, email.
$10 UV flashlight from Home Depot is what I use for glow spoons.
Thanks fellas Will stop by HD on the way home .
Thanks again Billy bye  Just like you said  Will try it out tomorrow when I get back with supplies.
Got the same one, works great for the salmon glow spoons.
Sweet!  I'm sure the fish will like the pink
